{{Location Intro|description=<p>It is a small chamber branching off the east side of [[Sekhem Hall]], which the player will access during the {{Quest|Dual Evidence}}. Solving its puzzles will grant '''Clearance Level 3''' for the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]].
</p>}} 

==How to Unlock==
Enter Sekhem Hall, preferably through the waypoint, then head to the first hallway on the right. After going through the hallway, turn left where a [[Primal Sconce]] can be spotted. The [[Primal Ember]] will show the way to the Place of Breath.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Those who ascend to Aaru will no longer know what it is to sigh, and their words shall come out all joy, while their ears shall be filled with the great deeds of King Deshret and glad, bird-like singing.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}
